alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 8:31AM PST until March 10 at 12:30PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southeast California, including the following county, Inyo. * WHEN...Until 730 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 831 AM PST, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Baker Creek, Owens River, Shepherd Creek, Big Pine Canal, Sawmill Creek, Oak Creek, North Fork Oak Creek, Birch Creek, Symmes Creek, Goodale Creek, Big Pine Creek, Bairs Creek, Independence Creek, Pinyon Creek, Division Creek, Little Pine Creek, Tinemaha Creek, George Creek and Taboose Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Independence, Big Pine, Sawmill Creek Campground, Goodale Creek Campground, Taboose Creek Campground, Oak Creek Campground, Tinemaha Campground, Independence Creek Campground and Baker Creek Campground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
